articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text commentary, score updates and match report from Atalanta vs Celtic in the Champions League.
articles.title: Atalanta vs Celtic: Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Watch coverage and follow live text commentary of Tyson Fury vs Oleksandr Usyk 2 press conference for their heavyweight rematch in December.
articles.title: Tyson Fury vs Oleksandr Usyk 2 press conference: Watch stream & follow live text updates

articles.description: Jose Mourinho mischievously suggests his Manchester United side of 2018 could be awarded the Premier League title.
articles.title: Man Utd vs Fenerbahce: Jose Mourinho quips United could get 2018 Premier League title amid Man City case

articles.description: Captain John McGinn says manager Unai Emery's place among the legendary figures in Aston Villa's history is already assured.
articles.title: John McGinn: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery is incomparable

articles.description: Ben Stokes has already suffered one defeat in Rawalpindi this week, but a bigger prize is on offer in the final Test, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Pakistan v England: Ben Stokes eyes series win in Rawalpindi

articles.description: Sione Tuipulotu will captain Scotland in the autumn Tests while his brother Mosese has been called up for the first time.
articles.title: Sione Tuipulotu to captain Scotland & brother Mosese called up

articles.description: Zimbabwe set a new world record for the highest team score in a men's international T20, scoring 344 runs against The Gambia.
articles.title: Zimbabwe set new T20 men's world record in World Cup qualifying win over The Gambia

articles.description: Minutes after Real Madrid fans were singing for Vinicius Jr to win the Ballon d'Or, the Brazil forward insisted he wants to "stay at the club forever".
articles.title: 'Extraordinary' Vinicius Jr favourite for Ballon d'Or

articles.description: Los Angeles Lakers star LeBron James and his son Bronny make history after becoming the first father-son duo to share the court in an NBA game.
articles.title: LeBron James: Los Angeles Lakers star makes NBA history by playing with son Bronny in season-opening win over Minnesota Timberwolves

articles.description: The ball struck by LA Dodgers hitter Shohei Ohtani when he secured a record-breaking 50th home run sells for £3.39m at auction.
articles.title: Shohei Ohtani's '50-50' baseball sells for record £3.39m at auction
